name: Remove Windows Defender Definition Files
description: Adversaries may disable security tools to avoid possible detection of their tools and activities by removing Windows Defender Definition Files
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.pe.original_file_name:MpCmdRun.exe AND process.command_line:*\ \-RemoveDefinitions* AND process.command_line:*\ \-All*)`
